welcome_message_body: "Welcome to El Alamo, a charming city known for its rich history and beautiful landscapes. We invite you to explore and experience all that our city has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The newest and largest terminal at Barajas Airport, with modern facilities and a wide variety of shops and restaurants.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: The second terminal at Barajas Airport, primarily used for domestic and Schengen flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: The oldest terminal at Barajas Airport, with limited facilities but close proximity to the parking areas.

terminals.name: Terminal 4
terminals.description: The main international terminal at Barajas Airport, with a modern and spacious design.

terminals.name: Terminal 4S
terminals.description: The satellite terminal connected to Terminal 4, used for long-haul and non-Schengen flights.

wifi.note: Limited to 30 minutes per device, additional time can be purchased for a fee.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Torrejon AFB Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Military Terminal
terminals.description: A separate terminal for military personnel and their families.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
